comments:

fail with a generic critical error. Log file:

Setting MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME to firefox's install directory does not help.
Created an attachment (id=28204)
screenshot of the generic error window
This is now fixed by having us guard against it, and I logged bug 112406 against SWT for
throwing this wierd exception.
Marking fixed.
Done.
